Class PromotionController

java.lang.Object
Controller.PromotionController
public class PromotionController extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PromotionController()
    Constructor of the PromotionController Class It will read the previously created promotions which have been saved to promotion.txt then instantiate the promotions and their respective items ony by one

      Adds a new promotion to promotions[]

      items - , the items' parameters in the order, id; name; description and price in string list
      Returns:

      itemId - , the item id which is used to search for a specific item in the promotion
